title: KVS & NVS Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 14967 Teaching and Non Teaching Posts
description: The Kendriya Vidyalaya Sangathan Navodaya Vidyalaya Samiti (KVS and NVS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 14967 Principal, Vice Principal, Assistant Commissioner, Post Graduate Teacher, Trained Graduate Teacher, Librarian, and Non-Teaching Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application.  candidates who have completed their Any Degree, Post-graduation, B.Ed., B.E./B. Tech, MCA, and...
